name: Balloon Popper (Zengir2424)
description:
You are on a Fair throwing darts and can pick up a reward bear with enough score.

This is my third project for Justin P Bernet's VR course.  This is based on module 2 (C# programming for VR). I recreated the module from 3d person view and put us in VR environment instead. 

Link to the course:

https://vrcreator.samcart.com/referral/fBX3Y4uC/8In5YUaUuxd6UPFx
